p: When a character chooses to delay his action, click on the Delay button on the toolbar. The character status changes to Delayed. Once the character is ready to jump in, click on the Jump In button. If more than one combat participant is delayed, Turn Watcher will ask you which one is jumping in.

When a character chooses to ready an action, click on the Ready button on the toolbar. The character status changes to Readied. Once the PC or monster action is triggered, click on the Jump In button. If more than one combat participant has a readied action, Turn Watcher will ask you which one is jumping in.
Turn Watcher automatically expires readied actions and delays when a character or opponent's turn comes up in the next round.
